jobDescription: trustaff is currently seeking an experienced CVOR Registered Nurse for a 13-week travel contract.  The Cardiovascular Operating Room (CVOR) Nurse works in operating rooms to treat open-heart patients. CVOR RNs perform cardiovascular patient care, quality monitoring, and coordination of care for the cardiovascular operating room.  1+ year of recent CVOR RN experience is required **Most travel contracts include:13-week contractsMultiple Shifts Available; Days & NightsGuaranteed Hours
